page.title: 07Home life in Helford area
page.content: RELIGION Manaccan Methodist Chapel and Sunday school. Community visited and ministerd to by Methodist Minister and C of E vicar of Manaccan with St Anthony and St Martin. HOMELIFE Small family units.Most homes have atleast one of the folloing pets: dog,cat,rabbit,hampster,budgie, pony,fish. SAFETY Many homes are fitted with anti theft devices, cut_out facilities on electrical appliances. FOOD Most people grow some of their own vegetables and fruit.This is cooked at home.Breakfast can include cereal, bacon & egg,toast.miday meal is often a snack.Evening meal meat, veg. and pudding.Local food is pasty, saffron cake,Cornish heavy cake,splits jam and cream;these are popular for croust at harvest time.
